tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read content from a file and return it as a string.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the file to be read

returns.description: Content of the file or error message

tools.name: write_file
tools.description: Write content to a file, creating it if it doesn't exist.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the file to be written

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Content to write to the file

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Mode to open the file in ('w' for write, 'a' for append)

tools.name: edit_code
tools.description: Edit or create Python code with error handling.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Python code to be edited or created

tools.name: run_tests
tools.description: Run tests on a set of Python code to ensure functionality.

tools.name: configure_team
tools.description: Configure a team structure and save it to a file.
